Scripts¶

This document contains all the scripts for/by CGAT. Scripts are written to be called from the command line.

Genomics¶

  • bam2geneprofile.py - build meta-gene profile for a set of transcripts/genes
  • bed2bed.py - manipulate bed files
  • bed2gff.py - convert bed to gff/gtf
  • gff2bed.py - convert from gff to bed
  • psl2assembly.py - assemble (long) reads on genome
  • psl2psl.py - manipulate psl files
  • psl2gff.py - convert from psl to gff
  • psl2map.py - build a mappping from blat alignments
  • psl2wiggle.py - convert from psl to wiggle
  • psl2wiggle_stats.py - intersect psl and wiggle files to compute stats
  • diff_gtf.py - compute overlap between multiple gtf files
  • fasta2gff.py - create random segments from fasta file
  • gff2psl.py - convert from gff to psl
  • gff2coverage.py - compute genomic coverage of gff intervals
  • gff2fasta.py - output sequences from genomic features
  • gtf2alleles.py - predict effects of variants on gene set
  • gff2gff.py - manipulate gff files
  • gff2histogram.py - compute histograms from intervals in gff or bed format
  • gff2plot.py - plot genomic data
  • gff2stats.py - count features, etc. in gff file
  • gff2view.py - view gff intervals in UCSC genome browser
  • gff_decorate.py - decorate genomic windows
  • gtf2gff.py - convert a transcript set to genomic features
  • gtf2gtf.py - manipulate transcript models
  • gtf2reads.py - sample reads from genes
  • gtf2table.py - annotate genes/transcripts
  • gtfs2graph.py - compute overlap graph between genes
  • gtf2fasta.py - annotate genomic bases from a gene set
  • snp2table.py - annotate variants
  • psl2fasta.py - output alignment pairs from psl formatted alignments
  • psl2stats.py - output genomic coverage from psl formatted alignments
  • psl2table.py - output stats for psl formatted alignments
  • maq2assembly.py - convert output from maq cns2view
  • maq2psl.py - wonvert the output of maqview to psl format
  • analyze_readpositions.py - compute read coverage on transcripts
  • combine_gff.py - merge overlapping intervals
  • quality2fasta.py - convert quality scores to fasta/fastq output
  • bam2wiggle.py - convert bam to wig/bigwig file
  • bed2annotator.py - convert bed to annotator format
  • bed2graph.py - compute the overlap graph between two bed files
  • bed2psl.py - convert a bed file to a psl file
  • chain2psl.py - convert a chain file to a psl file
  • diff_bed.py - count differences between several bed files
  • gff2table.py - compute features for intersection of two gff files
  • index2gff.py - convert indexed fasta file to gff file
  • map2psql.py - convert maf formatted file to a psl formatted file
  • maq2psl.py - wonvert the output of maqview to psl format
  • snp2counts.py - count number SNPs in geneset
  • snp2map.py - build maf formatted multiple genomic alignments from SNPs
  • psl2chain.py - convert psl formatted file to a chain formatted file

Trees¶

  • tree2matrix.py - convert a tree to a distance matrix
  • tree2plot.py - plot a tree as postscript (deprecated)
  • tree2stats.py - compute statistics on trees
  • tree2taxa.py - extract taxa in a tree
  • tree2tree.py - manipulate trees
  • tree2svg.py - plot a tree in svg format
  • tree_collapse_species.py - collapse single species nodes
  • tree_diff.py - compare two sets of trees
  • trees_train2species.py - convert trees containing strains to species trees
  • trees2sets.py - compute ortholog sets from trees
  • trees2tree.py - aggregate trees into a single tree
  • trees2trees.py - manipulate a collection of trees
  • tree_species2genes.py - collapse leaves with the same species.
  • matrix2tree.py - build tree from a distance matrix
  • fasta2nj.py - convert fasta file to nj input
  • tree2patterns.py - convert trees to taxon patterns
  • tree_species2genes.py - collapse leaves with the same species.

Alignment¶

  • align_transcripts.py - multiply align transcripts
  • peptides2cds.py - map peptide sequences onto nucleic acid sequences

Visualization¶

  • plot_data.py - create scatter plot from tabular data
  • plot_histogram.py - create line plot of tabular data
  • plot_matrix.py - plot a matrix (imshow)
  • png2svg.py - arrange several bitmat images into a single image
  • go2svg.py - plot results of a GO analysis

Graphs¶

  • graph2stats.py - calculate statistics for a (redundant) graph
  • graph_combine_links_redundant.py - remove redundant links
  • graph_filter_links_redundant.py -
  • graph_links2gdl.py - output graph in gdl format
  • compare_clusters.py - compare two partitions of the same data

Sequences and rates¶

  • align_pairs.py - align nucleotide sequence pairs
  • align_all_vs_all.py - all-vs-all pairwise alignment
  • jalview.py - build annotation for viewing in jalview
  • mali2bootstrap.py - create bootstrap samples from a mali
  • mali2mali.py - operate on a multiple alignments
  • mali2malis.py - split a multiple alignment into smaller multiple alignments
  • mali2summary.py - compute summary stats on a mali
  • malis2mali.py - concatenate multiple alignments
  • malis2malis.py - extract subsets of malis
  • malis2profiles.py - build profiles from malis
  • sequence2alignment.py - convert aligned sequences to an alignment
  • sequences2mali.py - build pileup mali from a set of sequences
  • mask_fasta.py - mask fasta formatted sequences
  • index_fasta.py - Index fasta formatted files
  • mali2kaks.py - rate analysis with PAML
  • mali2rates.py - calculate rates for sequences in a multiple alignment
  • malis2masks.py - mask positions in a set of malis
  • diff_fasta.py - compare contents of two fasta files
  • rates2rates.py - operate on rates
  • introns2rates.py - compute rates of aligned intron sequences
  • nr2table.py - convert description in nr fasta file to table
  • extractseq.py - extract sequences/sequence regions from a fasta file
  • quality2masks.py - mask low-quality bases in multiple alignment
  • map_residues.py - liftover for residues

Matrices and Tables¶

  • combine_histograms.py - combine several histograms
  • csvs2csv.py - join tables
  • csv2csv.py - operate on tables
  • csv2db.py - upload table to database
  • csv2xls.py - convert table to excel format
  • csv_cut.py - select columns from a table
  • csv_intersection.py - intersect two tables
  • csv_rename.py - rename columns in a table
  • csv_set.py - set operations on a table
  • cat_tables.py - concatenate tables
  • matrix2matrix.py - operate on matrices
  • matrix2stats.py - compute statistics on matrices
  • sparse2full.py - convert a sparse matrix to adjacency matrix
  • filter_tokens.py - select columns from a table
  • convert adjacency lists to edge lists
  • table2table.py - operate on tables
  • join_tables.py - join tables
  • substitute_tokens.py - substitute fields in tables

Stats¶

  • histograms2distance.py - compute Kullback-Leibler distance
  • data2roc.py - compute ROC data
  • data2stats.py - summary statistics on table columns/rows
  • data2bins.py - split table according to values in a column
  • data2histogram.py - histogram data in a table
  • data2multiple_anova.py - compute multiple ANOVA between samples
  • histogram2histogram.py - operations on histograms
  • merge_tables.py -
  • modify_table.py -
  • r_compare_distributions.py - statistical test for distributions
  • r_mann_whitney_u.py - Mann-Whitney U test
  • r_table2scatter.py - R based plots and stats
  • r_test.py - t-test and wilcoxon tests
  • calculate_histogram_2D.py - calculate 2D histogram
  • simulate_function.py - create datapoints for a function
  • histograms2kl.py - compute Kullback-Leibler distance

Tools¶

Databases¶

  • mysql_clone_database.py - clone a mysql database
  • psql_add_tables.py - merge two tables
  • psql_clone_database.py - clone a psql schema
  • check_db.py - do a sanity check for a collection of linked tables

Cluster and jobs¶

  • farm.py - execute a cmd on the cluster
  • qkill.py - kill jobs in the queue
  • nofarm.py - stand-in for farm.py
  • run.py - wrapper around command line
  • submit.py - run a collection of qsub scripts on the cluster
  • clean.py - clean up output files from aborted runs
  • cluster_distribute.py - distribute files to cluster nodes
  • cgat_logfiles2tsv.py - create summary from logfiles
  • split_file.py - split a file into parts

Other¶

  • rename_links.py - rename all links in a directory
  • cgat_log2wiki.py - convert a log file into a wiki page
  • convert_time2seconds.py -
  • cgat_html_add_toc.py - insert table of contents in html document
  • set_diff.py - compare contents of several files

Unsorted¶

  • Add a number of random reads to an aligned bam file
  • align_mali_vs_mali.py - align two multiple alignments
  • analyze_go.py -
  • bam2UniquePairs.py - filter/report uniquely mapped read pairs from a (bwa!) bam-file
  • bam2bam.py - modify bam files
  • cgat_script_template.py - template for CGAT scripts
  • bam2fastq.py - output fastq files from a bam-file
  • bam2peakshape.py - compute peak shape features from a bam-file
  • bam2stats.py - compute stats from a bam-file
  • bam2transcriptContribution.py
  • barplotGo.py
  • beds2counts.py - compute overlap stats between multiple bed files
  • bed2fasta.py - get sequences from bed file
  • bed2stats.py - summary of bed file contents
  • bed2table.py - annotate intervals
  • beds2beds.py - decompose bed files
  • blast2table.py - output tabular results from BLAST/PSIBLAST runs
  • cgat_build_report_page.py - build report page for all projects
  • chain2stats.py
  • combine_tables.py - join tables
  • diff_chains.py - compare to chain formatted files
  • fasta2table.py - analyze sequences for codon bias and other sequence properties
  • fasta2variants.py - create sequence variants from a set of sequences
  • fastq2N.py -
  • fastq2fastq.py - manipulate fastq files
  • fastq2solid.py - convert fastq to solid
  • fastq2table.py - compute stats on reads in fastq files
  • filter_reads.py -
  • genelist_analysis.py -analyse gene lists (GO, etc.)
  • genome_bed.py - Create a bed file tiling a genome from a fai file
  • go2plot.py -
  • gtf2Overlap.py
  • index2bed.py - convert indexed fasta file to bed file
  • table2bed.py
  • liftover.py -
  • list_overlap.py - compute overlap between lists
  • mali2summary.py - compute column stats for a multiple alignment
  • mali_extract.py -
  • mali_phylip2fasta.py -
  • mali_plain2aln.py -
  • mali_remove_gaps.py -
  • medip_merge_intervals.py - merge differentially methylated regions
  • probeset2gene -
  • cgat_rebuild_extensions.py - rebuild all cython extensions
  • revigo.py - apply semantic clustering to GO output
  • cgat_ruffus_profile.py - analyze ruffus logfile
  • run_function.py - run a function within a python module remotely
  • snp2snp.py - manipulate lists of SNPs
  • solexa2stats.py - compute stats from solexa export files
  • tree_map_leaves.py -
  • vcf2vcf.py - manipulate vcf files
  • vcfstats_sqlite.py - reformat output of vcf-stats for database loading
  • wig2wig.py - manipulate wiggle files
  • bam_vs_bam.py - compute coverage correlation between bam files
  • bam_vs_bed.py - count context that reads map to
  • bam_vs_gtf.py - compare bam file against gene set
  • cgat2rdf.py - create rdf description of CGAT script
  • diff_bam.py - compare multiple bam files against each other
  • fasta2fasta.py - operate on sequences
  • fasta2kmercontent.py
  • fastas2fasta.py - concatenate sequences from multiple fasta files
  • fastqs2fasta.py - interleave two fastq files
  • fastqs2fastqs.py - manipulate (merge/reconcile) fastq files
  • gtf2tsv.py - convert gtf file to a tab-separated table
  • gtfs2tsv.py - compare two genesets
  • rnaseq_junction_bams2bam.py - convert mappings against junctions to genomic coordinates
  • gff2chunks.py - split a gff file into chunks
